Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Southbound Reroute near Damen/21st
ShortDescription: Southbound 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 18th, Ashland, Roosevelt, and Damen due to, street blockage near Damen/21st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 18th, Ashland, Roosevelt, and Damen due to, street blockage near Damen/21st.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Racine, Belmont, and Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, and Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier report of a minor fire at track at level. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier report of a minor fire at track at level.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
